attributes.action: Prevent The United States Of America From Openly Attacking Iran &/Or provoking them(Iran) into attacking, giving the united states the necessary grounds to launch an atack
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the United Kingdom has the ability to aid the United States in defusing the current escalation of words between Washington & Tehran, although Tehran maybe breeching current UN sanctions (in developing uranium enrichment) it is completely unnecessary for Washington to sabre rattle, so in which case it is best for all parties to sit round and negotiate.. Not launch another bundled military intervention.
